createTable.remarks: Table for categorising the user specific roles

column.name: first_name
column.remarks: User First Name: Limited to 80 characters

column.remarks: User Name for the purpose of Authentication

column.name: next_login_pwd_chng
column.remarks: Whether to force the user to change password on next login

column.name: pwd_attempt_count
column.remarks: How many attempts that given to a user for typing the wrong password

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: By whom the paricualr row is modified
